name: High-Dimensional Rosenbrock Optimization
description: Global optimization of the Rosenbrock banana function in n-dimensional space. This non-convex function features a parabolic valley containing the global minimum, testing algorithms' ability to navigate ill-conditioned search spaces.
constraint: All variables must satisfy x_i ∈ [-5.0, 10.0]. Function evaluations must maintain floating-point precision of 1e-8.

parameter_definitions.description: First dimension variable in Rosenbrock function
Second dimension variable in Rosenbrock function
Third dimension variable in Rosenbrock function

target.name: Function Value
target.description: Minimize the Rosenbrock function value defined as f(x) = Σ[100(x_{i+1}-x_i²)² + (1-x_i)²]
